nodes.text: The Kro'eval system was a star system, which lay on the edge of Separatist space during the Clone Wars. It contained at least two habitable planets, Kromus and Kromol, in the fourth and fifth orbits around the system.
During the Clone Wars, it was the site of the Battle of Kromus.

During the Living Force storyline, the information on the system's fourth and fifth planets in Galactic Republic records is swapped around, but is not entirely clear whether this includes the actual names of Kromus and Kromol.
